about.title: About AI Hypetrain
about.subtitle: Tracking my AI journey with transparent insights and real-world results
about.greeting: Hello, I'm the creator of AI Hypetrain
about.description1: As a developer and DevOps professional, I created this blog to document my experiences with various AI tools and technologies. Each post details my projects, including time investment, costs, and any revenue generated.
about.description2: My goal is to provide transparent insights into the practical applications of AI, helping others understand the real-world implications of these emerging technologies.
